{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless miniPCIe adapter |caption2 = 802.11n 2.4GHz MIMO 2T2R 300Mbps |pp = http://www.compex.com.sg:809/productdetailinfo.asp?model=WLE200N2-23&acc1Panel=1&acc2Panel=1 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE200N2-23 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE200N2 |submodelappend = |submodel = -23-ESD |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 29, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE200N2-23 |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = a09b |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TK4WLE200N2-23, TK4WLE200N2 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 04:F0:21 |chip1 = Atheros;AR9283; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = Compex |manuf_model = WLE200N2 |manuf_rev = -23 7A0000 v2.0 |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/21/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *The label on the FCC EUT notes the model as ''WLE200N2-23ESD'' w/ a 00:80:48 (''Compex'') OUI. :"WLE200N2 23 REV2.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :It is shown as using ''SST'' / ''Microchip'' power amplifier modules. ===Features=== * Atheros AR9283 (XSPAN family) chipset * 802.11n compliant and backward compatible with 802.11b/g * 2.4GHz Single-band 2 x 2 MIMO spatial multiplexing technique * Maximum output power 23dBm 802.11b/g - 26dBm MIMO (aggregate) * Supports up to 300Mbps physical data rates ===Ordering Configuration=== 
Item Code 	 	Chipset Card Information
WLE200N2-23 7A0000 	AR9283 	2x2 802.11 b/g/n PCIe mini card
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.compex.com.sg:809/Datasheets/WLE200N2-23_DSv1.1.2.pdf Datasheet] [[Category:English Documentation]]
